vote.text: Amendment SA 2285 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Point of order fell when the motion to waive the Budget Act was agreed to in Senate.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2285 and S. 1072 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 72 - 24. Record Vote Number: 12.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2285 and S. 1072 made in Senate.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2285.
Cloture on amendment SA 2285 invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 86 - 11. Record Vote Number: 10.
Cloture motion on SA 2285 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 2285 proposed by Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S769) To provide a complete substitute.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2285 and S. 1072 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 72 - 24. Record Vote Number: 12.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2285 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 2285 invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 86 - 11. Record Vote Number: 10.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2285 proposed by Senator Inhofe.
